short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Little toolbox to make children's browsing safe and fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real-Time Parental Control

Discover Crazy Gadget, an innovative extension designed to transform your children’s browsing experience. This advanced tool not only protects against inappropriate content through comprehensive screen and keyboard monitoring but also manages usage time and provides useful reminders, such as meal times. Additionally, it includes features that enhance visual comfort and browsing customization.

Key Features:

Visual Comfort: Activate the dark mode with customizable settings to reduce eye strain during extended screen sessions.

Bold Text: Improve content readability with the option to highlight text in bold.

Custom Scrollbars: Add a unique touch to your browsing experience with creative scrollbars.

Fun Animations: Bring a playful element to browsing with interactive animations, including bounces, rotations, and skew effects.

Zoom Control: Adjust the zoom level to your preference with the easy-to-use zoom feature for better visibility without relying on the browser’s default zoom.

Crazy Gadget is here to offer a safer, more comfortable, and personalized browsing experience. Try it now and enhance your children’s online experience.
